name: Hinterhalt
description: Command your army on the battlefield, build your own base and lead your nation to victory at all costs!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 , 64-Bit Processor: Multithreading processor (e.g i5) Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 , 64-Bit Processor: Multithreading processor (e.g i7) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: > 2 GB Graphics card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
